reviews.review_msg: Good professor but hard marker. Know the test prep sheet in and out. He does not use the book often but the library marked it as required - do not buy! Helpful guy with a very interesting sense of humour. I would recommend for most who want a good experience but not for those who want to polish their GPA.

Excellent professor. He lectures in an articulate, clear, and engaging way. He explains complex ideas and concepts in simple and understandable manner. I will definately try and get into another class that he is teaching.

Takes boring material and makes it extremely interesting. He has interesting side stories for almost every single topic and makes sure that no one in the class is bored. At the same time he is a very *very* hard marker. If you do not understand a single topic covered he will ream you on the tests. Worth it if you want to learn a lot.

Takes boring material and makes it extremely interesting. He has interesting side stories for almost every single topic and makes sure that no one in the class is bored. At the same time he is a very *very* hard marker. If you do not understand a single topic covered he will ream you on the tests. Worth it if you want to learn a lot but avoid if yo
Too hard. Lectures interesting but hes hard marker. Would not regrade my essay.

Like another commenter said before, going to his class is a pleasure. He makes geography interesting. He may be an extremely hard marker but his lectures relate to current events and enjoyable. He also gives you a 4 chances in the resource management quiz which is quite lenient.

Fun to listen to but can be confusing with the material. Helpful if you go to him and ask questions though. His office hours ran out and he actually walked with me to Ravens to continue over his lunch. He is not the best teacher in lectures. Worth it if you are willing to go out of your way to get help.

Lectures were very interesting. His tests were different in that we were able to choose which questions to write on. For example: choose 5 out of 8 words to write definitions for. The only negative feedback was he was very slow in marking and putting up lecture notes, assignments, grades. Other than that, great class!
Great teacher. A little disorganized though.
Horrible. His jokes are crud and he is completelynarcisstic. Thinks he is being helpful but he is confusing and his notes are almost illagible.
Good teaching style- subject matter can get boring though. He does his best to keep things upbeat
Do not buy the book. He assigns readings but they are not really on the tests. Posts all notes online. Know the definitions he gives you and review all his notes.
Hard but fair. Take a *lot* of notes. Tests directly from notes - not book.
